It is home to one of the oldest monasteries in
dating as back as 10th century. Local legend is that this place used to be a water body before. The village has around 100 houses scattered around the Lamayuru monastery as on 2012.
Lamayuru village is located around 125 KM from

on Leh - Srinagar Highway. Any vehicle going from Leh to Kargil/ Srinagar will invariably pass through Lamayuru. State transport buses ply from Leh bus stand to Lamayuru at 8:00 AM and 2:00 PM however it is wiser to visit bus stand a day before to confirm the timings.

content=It is a family run guest house. Price as on July 2012 is Rs 250 for a room (double beds). Charges for food is extra.
